title: Remote Effects Pro
summary: Want to be the master of the LULZ? Get this app for your Android Wear device!
description: Ever wanted to troll your friends or be the center of attention at the next party? Do you want to be the ultimate master of the LULZ? Here is your chance!With Remote Effects Pro you can remotely activate a variety of sounds directly from your Android Wear device and play them on your phone completely unnoticed! Underline your joke with the proper sound or play pranks on your friends and family.With more than 150 different sounds, ranging from the fabulously funny to the awesomely annoying, you’ll have a sound for any occasion!The remote soundboard is compatible with the LG G Watch R, the Samsung Gear Live, the Sony SmartWatch2, the Sony SmartBand and more.Smart Connect extension for SmartWatch 2Smart Connect extension for SmartBandSOUND CATEGORIES• Weapons• Alarm, Bells & Horns• Fart & Burp• Animals• Fun• Explosions• Horror• Human• SpeechFEATURES✔ More than 150+ awesome sounds✔ Remote control the sounds with your Android Wear device✔ Annoy or amaze your friends with stealthy sound effects✔ Create the soundtrack to your jokes✔ Command the lulz with the touch of a finger✔ Full tablet supportThank you for playing ‘Remote Effects Pro’!Get in touch with HandyGamesTM:http://www.handy-games.comJoin us on Facebook:http://www.fb.com/handygamesStay tuned on Google+:http://goo.gl/qkjngmSubscribe to our channel on YouTube:http://goo.gl/2Kq6yYCheck news on Twitter:http://www.twitter.com/handy_gamesFollow us on Instagram:http://instagram.com/handygamesImprint: http://www.handy-games.com/contact/© www.handy-games.com GmbH
descriptionHTML:
Ever wanted to troll your friends or be the center of attention at the next party? Do you want to be the ultimate master of the LULZ? Here is your chance!

With Remote Effects Pro you can remotely activate a variety of sounds directly from your Android Wear device and play them on your phone completely unnoticed! Underline your joke with the proper sound or play pranks on your friends and family.

With more than 150 different sounds, ranging from the fabulously funny to the awesomely annoying, you’ll have a sound for any occasion!

The remote soundboard is compatible with the LG G Watch R, the Samsung Gear Live, the Sony SmartWatch2, the Sony SmartBand and more.

Smart Connect extension for SmartWatch 2
Smart Connect extension for SmartBand

SOUND CATEGORIES
• Weapons
• Alarm, Bells & Horns
• Fart & Burp
• Animals
• Fun
• Explosions
• Horror
• Human
• Speech

FEATURES
✔ More than 150+ awesome sounds
✔ Remote control the sounds with your Android Wear device
✔ Annoy or amaze your friends with stealthy sound effects
✔ Create the soundtrack to your jokes
✔ Command the lulz with the touch of a finger
✔ Full tablet support

Thank you for playing ‘Remote Effects Pro’!

comments: Needs work! Frequently crashes on Android Lollipop. Also, when I flag a sound effect that I want to save as a favorite (I'm assuming that's the intended purpose of the flag is) it doesn't save when the app is closed.

Almost what I want Alright this is pretty cool and has some of the sound effects I wanted some of the dog noises and some wolf howls. I have flagged the sounds I want this would be better if you could add a section that just has your flagged sounds also either a one word description of the sounds or the ability to add a description of the sounds.

Crashes on phone and now watch too!! Works fine via my LG Watch R, crashes on my S6. I can select one sound group, when I come out and select another it crashes every time. Could definitely do with improving the different groups and also have a new group for favourites. Update: with G Watch R update, it force closes every time. Won't even load on the watch now! Total rip off that they haven't fixed any bugs amd it's actually gotten worse.
Works ok, however.... It works fine on an LG R. However the app constantly asks me to review privacy settings. Very annoying.
Note 3 crashes App crashes with note 3, didn't even try my moto 360
Never had a problem remote controlling this app from my watch, don't even need to open the app on the phone first. Using a g watch r and a nexus 5 as well as a nexus 6p.
recentChanges: Fixed a problem on certain Android 4.3 devices
